chapters.title: Chapter 15: Insects
chapters.info: Mili Skane, p. 284 (357)—Real name of Shiaine. A saddler's daughter from a village near Whitebridge. She went to Tar Valon at age fifteen to become a novice in the White Tower. When she was told she could not channel a spark, she became a Darkfriend. She is now one of the best assassins around.
